title: HTML Tag Attribute Hunter
description: Extract attributes from HTML tags. An attribute is a key-value pair inside an opening HTML tag, where the value is enclosed in double quotes.
solutionSummary: This pattern identifies HTML attributes. `[a-zA-Z\-]+` matches attribute names, which can contain letters and hyphens. It's followed by an equals sign and a value in double quotes. `[^"]*` is a negated character set that matches any character except a double quote, effectively capturing the attribute's value.
